content.text: Hi there, my name is participant_1. What's your name?
Hi participant_2, my name is Lucy. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too, Lucy! What do you do for fun?
I like to read, play board games, and go for walks in the park. What about you?
I love to play board games too! I also like to read biographies and watch movies.
That's cool! I've always wanted to try reading biographies. What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the biographies of Nelson Mandela and Steve Jobs. They're both really inspiring stories.
Oh, those are great choices! I've heard good things about both of those books.
What about you? What are some of your favorite board games?
I love Monopoly, Scrabble, and Clue. I also like to play card games like Uno and Go Fish.
Oh, I love all those games too! We should play sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free on Saturday.
Okay, great! I'll bring some games.
